nodes.text: The smuggler Ace and a Republic trooper was given a pair of boots of this make by the Cathar Yael whilst in Fort Garnik refugee camp on the planet Ord Mantell. Yael gave it to them as thanks for bringing her medicine stolen from her by members of the Mantellian Separatist Movement.

Drelliad boots first appeared as an item of medium armor in the Massively multiplayer online roleplaying game Star Wars: The Old Republic published by BioWare in 2011. The item is available as a reward to characters of the Smuggler or Trooper class for the completion of a quest on their starting planet Ord Mantell. The item can only be acquired in this way and so other classes can only obtain it through trading and Imperial players currently cannot obtain it. The boot's relation to Drelliad village, if any, is unknown.
